span.span: The value type with the indexer.

span.span: Represents an element referenced by an indexer on a value type that can be used as an l-value in an expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Свойство доступно только для чтения, но элементы и индексы в коллекции можно изменять.The property is read-only, but the items in the collection can be modified and the indices can be changed.
